results.content: I am learning alot in this short space of time.
results.content_html: I am learning alot in this short space of time.

results.content: Pra um curso pago, é beeeeem básico e não explica as funcionalidades de testes do phpunit e do laravel. O instrutor somente vai desenvolvendo a aplicação e a gente vai acompanhando.
results.content_html: Pra um curso pago, é beeeeem básico e não explica as funcionalidades de testes do phpunit e do laravel. O instrutor somente vai desenvolvendo a aplicação e a gente vai acompanhando.

results.content: Great course. I only wish the instructor would talk more on when/how to use unit testing, integration and regression tests, but the course is totally worth it nonetheless.
results.content_html: Great course. I only wish the instructor would talk more on when/how to use unit testing, integration and regression tests, but the course is totally worth it nonetheless.

results.content: Detailed, simple, and full of stunning practical wisdom. Wow! This is what an intermediate developer like me needs. :-)
results.content_html: Detailed, simple, and full of stunning practical wisdom. Wow! This is what an intermediate developer like me needs. :-)

results.content: This lesson is too repetitive. Almost every chapter is doing the same again and again...
results.content_html: This lesson is too repetitive. Almost every chapter is doing the same again and again...

results.content: Mostly audio inconsistency. In the middle of one of the videos the audio is missing. In one of the videos the voiume is too low and in the next one the volume increases. Not good if you use headphones.
results.content_html: Mostly audio inconsistency. In the middle of one of the videos the audio is missing. In one of the videos the voiume is too low and in the next one the volume increases. Not good if you use headphones.

results.content: Very instructive and pace neither too slow nor too fast.
results.content_html: Very instructive and pace neither too slow nor too fast.
